name: wakapi
tagline: A self-hosted coding activity and time tracker
description: Wakapi is a self-hosted WakaTime-like coding statistics tracker. It records editor activity via plugins and displays programming time, language stats, and trends via a web UI and API.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Automatically record time spent in your code editor with support for VS Code, IntelliJ, Vim,

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Install lightweight plugins that run in the background without impacting editor performance

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: All data stays on your server with no external tracking or data sharing with third

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate with other tools using the REST API to build custom dashboards or automation workflows

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Compare coding activity with team members through optional leaderboard features for friendly competition
